Parc aquatique Station Mont-Cascades Cantley Region: TA dsactiv
Some fifteen waterslides, water playgrounds and a complete fast food restaurant service make parc aquatique Mont Cascades (Mont Cascades water park) an ideal place for the whole family to cool off and have fun-enjoy a relaxation pool, wading pool, waterfalls and an umbrella fountain.
448, ch. Mont Cascades, Cantley Qubec, Canada, J8V3B2 819827-0301 1 888282-2722 (Canada)
